title: The Ultimate iPhone 12 Charging Kit Unboxing
description: Unboxing the Ultimate iPhone 12 Fast Charging Kit from my friends over at Anker!  iPhone 12 Pro Impressions!  Thanks to Anker for sponsoring the video! Get 12% off the all-new Anker Nano using the discounts below ... Amazon US  Use discount code USNANO12:  (Expires Nov 15th) Amazon UK  Use discount code UKNANO12:  (Expires Nov 15th) Amazon DE  Use discount code EUNANO12:  (Expires Nov 15th)  New Music Channel!   RTX 3080 Gaming PC -   14 inch MacBook Pro?   Giving the iPhone 11 to strangers  -   Follow me (if ya want) -
